description: Increases all party members' ATK by 12% and Crit. Rate by 10%, lasting for 30m. (This effect only applies to your own Resonator(s) in Co-op Mode)
bgDescription: Shuyun's ancestral secret herbal tea, most suitable for summer. But the taste is special, and the taste is polarized. The formula is never disclosed, and it is hard to buy. Usually, you can only ask Shuyun to make it.
